privacy_policy_notice: By continuing, you agree to our
operational_description: Collection and processing of data necessary to provide core POS services (account creation, order processing, inventory management).
analytics_description: Collection of anonymized usage data to enhance app features and user experience.
advertising_description: Sending promotional emails, special offers, and product news. You can unsubscribe anytime.
third_party_midtrans_description: Sharing payment data with Midtrans to securely process QRIS and other payment methods.
order_processing_description: Processing your guest order including delivery information and contact details.
order_communications_description: Sending order confirmations, status updates, and delivery notifications via email or SMS.
promotional_communications_description: Receiving special offers and promotions from this business.
payment_processing_midtrans_description: Sharing your payment information with Midtrans to complete the transaction securely.
consent_error_required: Please grant all required consents to continue
